GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article for the given article id

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for the given article id

comments.body: I carry a log — yes. Is it funny to you? It is not to me.
comments.author: icellusedkars

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a new comment for the given article id
